content.text: You approach the figure and the orb. ^1500So entranced by the glowing mass, you donâ€™t realize how close you stand next to the figure. ^1500You see him closer than you had before. ^1500You notice it glitches and jolts far more frequently than before, increasing in intensity. ^1500You meet eyes, then it gestures towards the orb once again. ^1500You feel a draw to reach out for it.
